RevisedPrescription: Ursodeoxycholic acid (UDCA) - Take 300-600 mg orally twice a day with meals. The dose may be adjusted based on response.
Antibiotics (e.g., ceftriaxone) - Administer IV or IM 1-2 grams once daily. Dosage adjustment may be needed based on renal function.
Pain relievers (e.g., acetaminophen) - Take 500-1000 mg orally every 4-6 hours as needed for pain. Do not exceed 4 grams in 24 hours.
